profile.name: Alessio
profile.title: Seeking the ultimate Web Experience, Elaborating marketing strategies, and blogging about philosophy!
profile.description: IT professional with 7 years of experience in Graphic Design, Web Design, Web Development, Marketing & Project Management. Cyber Security graduate. I take pride of being an acute problem-solver, with a focus on improving workflow, team culture and customer satisfaction.

experiences.title: Graphic Designer/Front End Web Developer
experiences.description: Consolidated corporate brand by designing brochures, emails, advertisements, newsletters, reports, infographics, presentations, exhibits, banners, storefronts, direct mail, email campaigns, Eblast, social media content and web pages. Created 20+ different art concepts. Managed the company website by providing optimized code (HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, PHP), versatile solutions for Drupal CMS. Offered best practices for performance purposes. Established professional productive relationship with company’s video producers and cooperated in the production of audio, video, web advertisement.

experiences.title: Graphic/Logo/Web Designer
experiences.description: Designed wide array of graphic products and full stack web applications.

experiences.title: Assistant Graphic Designer & Front-End Web Developer
experiences.description: Managed company’s websites WordPress CMS. Organization of stylesheets. Heavy customization of WordPress templates using HTML, PHP, jQuery. Improved brand by designing logos, brochures, flyers, rollups.  Led marketing efforts by maintaining social channels, video editing, email marketing, etc.

projects.name: Golden Group
projects.label: Read More
projects.description: This was my very first experience with WordPress and professional Web Design in general 5 years ago. The project was the main website of an Italian SE. Today they revamped the site to adhere to more recent design standards. It is always good to improve!

projects.name: Roadshow Lavoro
projects.label: Read More
projects.description: Along with the previous project (Golden Group), I managed and customized another two websites for the company: roadshowlavoro.com and davidemalaguti.com. The latter I have not designed myself, but I contributed into managing it through WordPress platform.

projects.name: Italy Is Wonderful
projects.label: Read More
projects.description: This project was a customization of an already existing .NET website for a travel agency business. I must say I was new to .NET but we were able to deliver a professional product.

projects.name: Deluxe Captcha
projects.label: Read More
projects.description: This was a tough learning experience. I know, everybody hates Captchas, that's why I tried to make a more fun version of it. This is a WordPress plugin I developed from scratch in my free time. Is Based on PHP and Javascript.

projects.name: HITS
projects.label: Read More
projects.description: Here I built a website for an economically-disadvantaged woman-owned Small Business. The website on the WordPress platform in compliance with 508 standards. Responsive and mobile friendly, offers a great UX.

projects.name: Poetry Is Wonderful
projects.label: Read More
projects.description: This website was a part of a blogging platform project I decided to develop in my free time. Users were able upload their own poetries and a voice-recorded version of them. Site is currently offline, but the idea is still there...

projects.name: Ark Shield
projects.label: Read More
projects.description: Here I was given a sketch, some few requirements about a shield and a sword. The rest is creative interpretation of the designer.

projects.name: Our Secret Ingredient
projects.label: Read More
projects.description: This project was for a Chef that launched her own Personal-Chef business. The WordPress platform would be the interface between the customers and the business for orders and appointments!

projects.name: Matteo Venturi
projects.label: Read More
projects.description: This project features an emerging Italian rock artis who contacted me to build his website. Together we created a brand, a social media presence and a responsive Wordpress website of course!

projects.name: Honeymoon
projects.label: Read More
projects.description: Perfect logo for ballrooms, clubs, theaters, etc. Logo is open for modifications, and could eventually fit also restaurants and hotels. The concept of the logo aims to a classy environment, and a romantic atmosphere. Colors can be adjusted by the business to fit their needs, I am at disposition. I will create a corporate identity for you.

projects.name: Pencil
projects.label: Read More
projects.description: The logo is a conjunction of a pen and a pencil. I was inspired by some of those amazing artists who can draw just about anything with only a pen or a pencil. The main theme would be orange for energy and warmth with some violet/purple for creativity. This logo is meant for graphic/design or creative companies.

projects.name: Record Cakes
projects.label: Read More
projects.description: Perfect logo for bakery and pastry shops. Can fit nicely also bar, lounges, pubs, etc. The idea is to mix a modern style with some retro taste. You can start your business with this new brand. Colors can be adjusted by the business to fit their needs. I will create a corporate identity you can be proud of.
